entry.title: Habits Of My Heart
entry.summary:
Author: sunrue

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,098Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 363

Summary: "Stiles." His voice came out gruff, lower than usual, "If everything is too loud and you can't find a place to be safe,¬†come and find me. I will be your quiet."For once, Stiles had nothing to say. He felt his heart speed up, felt his mouth gaping like a fish. Derek's hand was still gripping his wrist - it felt like a lifeline. An anchor, keeping him grounded."I will." He replied eventually. He wasn't sure if he was intending to stick to that or not, but he vowed to at least try. "Thank you, Derek." They could both hear the words that were going unspoken, the 'and not just for the ride'. He didn't need to say it.--Or, the one where Derek Hale was suddenly everywhere, and Stiles was suddenly uncertain.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,447Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 128

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn‚Äôt.No explanations, no goodbyes‚Äîjust the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn‚Äôt understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don‚Äôt need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: DON‚ÄôT DIE, DUMBASS
entry.summary:
Author: Noctirax

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,980Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 22

Summary: Stiles was certain‚Äîutterly certain‚Äîthere had been someone in the middle of the road. Sure, the figure had moved with an unnatural quickness, vanishing as suddenly as he appeared but that didn't mean anything. Just standard Beacon Hills bullshit‚Äîhome to the strange and unexplained. No, that wasn't what bothered him. What bothered him was that he hadn‚Äôt just seen someone. He‚Äôd seen someone he was damn sure he knew. Dark hair against pale skin, and leather jacket over broad shoulders, body squared, braced for impact. It was a posture Stiles had seen countless times, most often standing between him and something that was trying to rip his throat out. For a fleeting second, amidst the screech of tires and the adrenaline flooding his system, Stiles could have sworn he‚Äôd seen Derek Hale standing in the middle of the road. Only that wasn't possible because Derek was dead, very, very dead.

entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,775Chapters: 1/11Kudos: 81

Summary: ‚ÄúYou kissed me,‚Äù Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles‚Äô mouth. ‚ÄúBut you‚Ä¶ you‚Äôre straight,‚Äù Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. ‚ÄúYou have a girlfriend,‚Äù Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant. ¬†Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.

entry.title: I wish I could leave you my love (But my heart is a mess)
entry.summary:
Author: Winelady

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,196Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 183

Summary: The Sheriff exhales. "I need you to go. The pack, too. Stiles has a chance at a normal life now, and I need you to give him that."Derek feels like the floor has disappeared beneath him. "No," he says instinctively, shaking his head. "No, I can help‚Äî""Derek." The Sheriff‚Äôs voice is firm, but there‚Äôs an unmistakable sadness in it. "For the first time in years, Stiles is safe. He doesn‚Äôt remember any of it‚Äîthe supernatural, the threats, the things that nearly killed him. He has a chance at something normal. We can‚Äôt take that away from him."Sheriff doesn‚Äôt know the weight of what Derek is being asked to do.But Derek does.****This is the story of how Derek Hale lost the love of his life‚Äîand how Stiles Stilinski, being the stubborn little shit he is, wormed his way into his life again.
